Layout Home

The Layout module index page offers common page creation, editing and manipulation choices.
Create new page
  1. Click Create Page.

Show me how

Duplicate page
  1. Click next to page name.
Edit page
  1. Click next to page name
Delete or restore an archived page

The Archived Pages link, located at the bottom of the page list in the Navigation Panel (called the panel actions area), will only appear if you have archived pages.

  1. In Panel Actions, click Archived Pages.
  2. From the list of archived pages, click either Delete or Restore.
Change page title
  1. Click next to page name. You can change the title for other enabled language here also.
Change page order

  1. To change the order of pages, click on a page and drag it to a new position.

Preview app layout
  1. Click a device icon at the top of the page
